text: The Canada Safety Council is a national, non-profit, charitable organization dedicated to safety. It works to prevent deaths and injuries by promoting education and awareness across Canada. It provides marketing opportunities for its sponsors.https://canadasafetycouncil.org/sponsorship/ ==External links== *Official website: English, French *Gearing Up, www.ridertraining.org ==References== Category:Non-profit organizations based in Ottawa
title: Canada Safety Council
